name: Bears, Beets, Battlestar...
description: (As a side note, our "You Are What You Eat" shirt is 50% off right now!) This is a Limited Edition shirt, reserved for loyal fans of "The Office". "Bears, Beets, Battlestar" is tested and proven to evoke the most absurd symptoms from fellow fans. Symptoms may include (but not limited to) laughter, crying, nose bleeds, sensitivity to light, unpredictable rushes of emotions, numbness in extremities, high pitched voices, Paraskevidekatriaphobia, rapid chest hair growth (yes, this applies to women as well), dry mouth, vision impairment, and excessive hugging. All domestic shipping costs are currently free! International orders are $9 for 1 shirt and $0.50 more for every shirt thereafter.

name: You Are What You Eat
description: Last Printing! You are what you eat - that's why I only eat dinosaurs. It's printed on super soft American Apparel with even softer ink. American Apparel is a fashion cut brand, so check the AA sizing chart. All domestic shipping costs are currently free! International orders are $9 for 1 shirt and $0.50 more for every shirt thereafter.

name: Help Haiti
description:
That's it! We've posted what we have left. When it's gone - it's gone. Thanks for all the support! Special thanks to our printer, Image Designers Inc., for giving us a discount on printing! Their discount will add on to the total donation to Haiti. Given the catastrophic events that occurred in Haiti, Doubletake Clothing wants to do something to help the 3 million people affected by the earthquake. No words can describe what the Haitian population is going through right now. All net proceeds will go to several Haiti Earthquake Relief Organizations including UNICEF, Doctors Without Borders, and CSI Ministries. Doubletake Clothing is not charging any overhead (we make $0!) and all domestic shipping costs are included! International shipping is reduced to $5. We're working with suppliers to reduce the costs of materials to maximize the donation to Haiti. We will periodically update our estimated total donation. This is a pre-order item, so we will get the shirts to you as fast as possible. If you would like to purchase a $20 shirt in order to donate an additional $5, please do so here. Our prayers are with Haiti. Support by sharing this on Twitter! Share

Update (1/13/10 11:05PM EST): If you want to specify where your donation will go, use coupon code "UNICEF", "DOCTORS", or "CSI". 1% will be taken off your total order (Unfortunately, using a coupon code is our only means of classifying using our current system, and 1% is the lowest amount.) 1/14/10 8:20AM EST: $443 raised 1/14/10 10:20AM EST: $829! 1/14/10 11:02AM EST: $1000! 1/14/10 5:47PM EST: $2000! 1/15/10 6:25AM EST: $2639!! 1/15/10 1:33PM EST: $3000!! 1/16/10 8:31AM EST: $3448!! 1/17/10 9:27AM EST: $3947!! 1/17/10 6:19PM EST: $4322!! 1/18/10 9:58AM EST: $4616!! 1/19/10 8:58AM EST: $5216!! 1/24/10 6:59PM EST: Over $7,000!! Final: We just donated $13,475! Thanks for all the help! You guys are amazing! Please continue sharing with your co-workers, friends, and family. This is turning into something extremely special!! We recommend sharing with Twitter (with #haiti tags) and Facebook! Thank you for supporting Haiti!

name: Help Haiti $20
description:

No words can describe what the Haitian population is going through right now.
